tagline: Premium timber solutions for global markets

hero.title: Global Wood Solutions, Delivered at Scale
hero.subtitle: We connect international buyers with reliable mills across Brazil and other leading timber regions—customized specs, container-scale volumes, and coordinated FOB shipments.

products.title: Product Portfolio
products.subtitle: Comprehensive wood solutions from tropical hardwoods to engineered products, all delivered in container-scale volumes with FOB coordination.

decking.title: Solid Decking & Flooring
decking.description: Ipe, Cumaru, Jatoba, Garapa, Teak. Container volumes; custom dimensions.

engineered.title: Engineered Flooring
engineered.description: Tropical top layer, multi-ply core for stability.

sawn.title: Sawn Timber
sawn.description: Tropical and reforested species; raw or processed to specifications.

plywood.title: Plywood
plywood.description: Pine, Camphor; WBP options; E0/E1 grades available.

mdf.title: MDF / MDP / HDF
mdf.description: Multiple densities and finishes for interior use.

doors.title: Doors & Frames
doors.description: Solid or engineered; fire-resistant options on request.

process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: Simple, transparent process from specification to FOB delivery

3.title: Confirm & Pay
3.description: Confirm and pay (CAD / T/T against B/L)

4.title: Quality Control
4.description: Production and QC (optional SGS / Bureau Veritas)

whyUs.title: Why Amazin Timber
points: Global partner for high-quality wood product supply
Third-party quality control available (SGS / Bureau Veritas)

certifications.title: Certifications & Partners
certifications.subtitle: Quality assurance through trusted accreditation bodies

about.title: About Amazin Timber
about.description: Amazin Timber connects buyers with reliable mills to ensure fit-for-purpose wood products at container scale. Through our network of suppliers in Brazil and beyond, we guarantee specification compliance, timelines, and factory-level pricing with coordination of every step until vessel departure.

catalog.title: Product Catalog 2025
catalog.subtitle: Download our comprehensive catalog featuring specifications, grades, and availability for all product categories.

minimum.question: What is the minimum order quantity?

quality.question: Do you offer third-party quality control?
quality.answer: Yes — SGS or Bureau Veritas on request.

certified.question: Are certified materials available?
certified.answer: FSC®/PEFC availability depends on product and mill.

regions.question: What regions do you serve?
regions.answer: Primarily Brazil; other regions based on availability.

quote.title: Request a Quote
quote.subtitle: Get a custom FOB quote for your wood requirements. Minimum order: 1 FCL.

footer.tagline: Global wood solutions, delivered at scale
